When exploring data, it is useful to identify how many observations are missing.
The `SLpackage` simplifies exploratory data analysis by enabling a user to create
consumable summary statistics that can be used for presenting data mining findings.

## Example

```{r}
obs_less_na(x = iris$Sepal.Length,
            y = "Sepal Length")

obs_less_na(x = iris$Sepal.Width,
            y = "Sepal Width")

obs_less_na(x = iris$Petal.Length,
            y = "Petal Length")

obs_less_na(x = iris$Petal.Width,
            y = "Petal Length")

obs_less_na(x = iris$Species,
            y = "Species")
```
